title: OpenAI threatens legal action against the developer of a free GPT4-powered chatbot for sneaking past its paywall
description: One developer faces a potential legal fight for a chatbot that pulls GPT4 answers for free.

title: Skywind, the ambitious mod remaking Morrowind in Skyrim, has a new 20 minute gameplay video showing off an entire quest
description: In "Necromancer in Mawia," the player travels from Molag Mar to an island tower to eliminate a dark elf.

title: Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom has leaked on piracy sites, and Nintendo's now in a whack-a-mole war with streamers
description: Copies being sold early have now made their way to pirate sites, hacked Switches and emulators.

title: 'Godfather of Deep Learning' quits Google and warns of AI dangers: 'I don’t think they should scale this up more until they have understood whether they can control it'
description: Dr. Geoffrey Hinton, one of the foremost researchers in the field of AI, has some concerns about where his groundbreaking work will lead.

title: NASA extends Voyager 2's space mission by basically putting it into power-saver mode
description: The Voyager 2 probe will have to postpone its retirement party.

title: Here's when Redfall launches around the world
description: Arkane's new vampire hunting co-op game launches on May 1 and May 2, depending on your time zone.
